tourSteps.content: This experience will walkthrough how to perform coreference annotation.
Displayed on the screen below is a document and two mentions.
The first Mention is automatically assigned to it's own Corefernce Cluster.
Clusters are managed in the cluster bank.
Clusters can be selected with the arrow keys, or by clicking on a previously assigned mention.
The current mention appears in purple.
The current mention can be assigned to the selected cluster with the SPACE bar.
If the current mention does not belong to any cluster in the cluster bank it can be assigned to new cluster with Ctrl + SPACE (Windows) or ALT + SPACE (MacOS).
If the current mention does not belong to any cluster in the cluster bank it can be assigned to new cluster with Ctrl + SPACE (Windows) or ALT + SPACE (MacOS).
If a mention was assigned incorrectly assigned it can be selected for reassignment at any point with Ctrl + Click on Mention (Windows) or Alt + Click on Mention (MacOS).
If you ever forget any of the controls all of CoRefi's functionality can be found in the help menu. Just click on the blue '?' in the bottom left corner of the screen.
Now using what you've learned assign the remaining mentions to the correct clusters until they are all assigned. Don't worry if you make mistakes CoRefi will guided to the correct answers.
